shadow.name: INTOLERANCE
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Youthful Folly, expressing through intolerance

gift.name: UNDERSTANDING
gift.description: The gift frequency of Youthful Folly, expressing through understanding

siddhi.name: FORGIVENESS
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Youthful Folly, expressing through forgiveness

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 4 shadow frequency. The intolerance you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural understanding. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from intolerance to understanding.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your ajna. Notice the sensation of intolerance.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 4 consciously for 7 days, the intolerance pattern will shift toward understanding.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 4 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from intolerance toward understanding
